description: Register a public key in a keypair under a certain name. API command registerSSHKeyPair
name: sshkeypair_register

apikey.description: API KEY to use at ACS request

project_id.description: An optional project for the ssh key.

public_key.description: Public key material of the keypair

secretkey.description: Secret KEY to use at ACS request

url.description: URL to use at ACS request
